ceci-double-button/description: Responds to your clicks and taps.
ceci-double-button/clickleft/description: Occurs when left button is clicked.
ceci-double-button/clickright/descriptio: Occurs when right button is clicked.
ceci-double-button/leftbuttoncolor/descr: Background color of the left button.
ceci-double-button/rightbuttoncolor/desc: Background color of the right button.
ceci-double-button/textcolor/description: Color of the text on the button's label.
ceci-double-button/attributes/leftlabel/: Text shown on the left button.
ceci-double-button/attributes/rightlabel: Text shown on the right button.
